definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience

sentences.english: Finally , an example showed that the algorithm can effectively improving the Subjective Test's automated assesment.
sentences.chinese: 算例说明该算法能有效提高主观题自动评阅的精确度。

sentences.english: In the months that followed, party leaders across Jiangsu Province began recruiting their own teams of Web commentators.
sentences.chinese: 之后，江苏省的各级领导开始招募本地的网络评阅员。

sentences.english: We want to thank the referees for all that you do for our manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 我们要感谢评阅人对我们的稿子所做的一切。

definition: to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to draw up the theme (for discussion)
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to read through to evaluate/to referee
